parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Failure due to Defective Hoses and Fittings in Amsoil By-Pass Kit
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the hoses and fittings in the Amsoil By-Pass Kit can cause engine failure, oil leakage, and even engine fires, which can lead to accidents, injuries, and property damage.
The failure of the steering linkage can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: the steering wheel feels loose or unstable
the vehicle is difficult to steer
the vehicle strikes an object or another vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Recall Repair for Steering Shaft
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inadequate repair of the steering shaft can cause it to come loose, leading to a loss of vehicle control, accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The steering shaft feels loose or unstable
the steering wheel vibrates or shakes
the vehicle is difficult to steer

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause prolonged stopping distances, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: brake pedal travels further than usual
oil present in brake vacuum pump and hoses.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake vacuum pump can cause a loss of brake power assist, leading to increased stopping distances and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: brake pedal travels further than usual
oil present in brake vacuum pump and hoses.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake hoses can cause a loss of brake fluid, leading to a loss of brake power assist and increased stopping distances, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: brake pedal travels further than usual
oil present in brake vacuum pump and hoses.
